ygData.subject: Can you uncharm you pet?
ygData.msgSnippet: I charmed a kobold runt and had it attack something.  Well, the runt didn t last long and it died and the corpse immediatly disappeared. So is there a command
ygData.messageBody:
I charmed a kobold runt and had it attack something. Well, the runt didn't
last long
and it died and the corpse immediatly disappeared.

So is there a command to make your pet just a regular mob again without
waiting for it to wear off?

Azboklin the enchanter who is suffering from charm withdrawl

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
